bot.title: AlexxBot
dcbot.log.error.guild: Unable to log the desired message: Guild not found
dcbot.log.error.channel: Unable to log the desired message: Channel not found
init.stage0.successful: Init stage 0 of 3 fulfilled successfully, as it is an automatic stage. Use command `init` while in any init stage to see help on current stage. Normal commands doesn't work until initialization is finished. The default command short-prefix is `$` until you define your own prefix in init stage 1.
init.stage1.intro: Init stage 1 of 3 active. Please run the command `setprefix <prefix>` with your preferred settings! (Prefix can only be exactly 1 character long)
init.stage2.intro: Init stage 2 of 3 active. Please run the command `chanset log <channel-ping>` with your preferred channel!
init.stage3.intro: Init stage 3 of 3 active. Please run the command `addcmdchan <channel-ping>` with your preferred channel!
init.completed: Init finished. The bot is now set up to work in production.
command.addcmdchan.meta.description: Add an existing channel to the list of command-allowed channels for users
command.apply.meta.description: Apply for the Hypixel streaming-guild from AlexxOffi
command.apply.err.noprofile: Please specify your Skyblock profile name
command.apply.err.playernotfound: The player {playername} was not found on Hypixel.
command.apply.err.playernotlinked: Your Hypixel profile is not linked to your Discord profile. Please add your Discord profile "{actual_dc_tag}" in your Hypixel settings menu.
command.apply.err.playerwronglinked: Your Hypixel profile is linked to the wrong Discord profile. Please change your Discord profile from "{api_dc_tag}" to "{actual_dc_tag}" in your Hypixel settings menu.
command.apply.err.profilenotfound: This player has no profile named "{profile}"
command.chanset.meta.description: Set the channel ID for a Key-Identifier
command.faq.meta.description: Send an embed with a both custom texts as title and description. Useful for FAQs
command.help.meta.description: Show the help for this bot
command.info.embed.title: Bot information on {bot_title}
command.info.embed.desc: This bot can auto-moderate, run guild-specific commands and show fancy statistics.
command.info.embed.field.author.title: Author (Maintainer)
command.info.embed.field.version.title: Current Version
command.info.embed.field.upstream.title: Upstream (GitHub)
command.info.embed.field.prefix.title: Botprefix for commands
command.info.embed.field.bugreports.valu: [Create issue on GitHub](https://github.com/DerDomee/discordbot-alexxoffi/issues/new/choose) or contact me (<@285720078031388673>) via Discord!
command.language.meta.description: Manage the language in which the bot speaks to you
command.printarg.meta.description: A debug command that tests the internal string-lexer that is used to lex and parse a message content into a command-argument-stack
command.rmcmdchan.meta.description: Remove a channel from the list of command-allowed channels for users
command.server.embed.field.owner.title: Server owner
command.server.embed.field.members.title: {member_count} members
command.setprefix.meta.description: Set a new command prefix for this bot
command.voice.meta.description: Control the dynamic voice channel you are currently connected to, if you are its owner.
command.voice.transfer.user_not_found: The user you want to transfer the channel ownership to was not found.
command.voice.transfer.successful:
The channel ownership successfully changed from {previous_mention} to {new_mention}.
{new_mention}, you now can execute all voice commands.
command.voice.transfer.self_not_permitte: You can not transfer the ownership to yourself.
command.voice.invite.channel_not_private: Your voice channel is not a private channel, so inviting is not necessary.
command.voice.invite.user_not_found: The user you want to invite into your channel was not found.
command.voice.invite.rolecheck_failed: There was an error inviting this user. Try again later or create a new voice channel.
command.voice.invite.self_not_permitted: You can not invite yourself to the channel.
command.voice.kick.channel_not_private: Your voice channel is not a private channel, so kicking is pointless.
command.voice.kick.user_not_found: The user you want to kick from your channel is not a member already or there was an error with the Discord API!
command.voice.kick.rolecheck_failed: There was an error kicking this user. Try again later or force close the voice channel with `voice close`.
command.voice.kick.self_not_permitted: You can not kick yourself from the channel.
command.warn.meta.description: Warn a user on the discord
command.warn.error.user_not_found: User not found. Can not warn a non-existant user.
command.warn.notifiaction.warned: You have been warned on the server. Use the command `user` in a bot channel on the server to see further information on the warn! Warns usually expire after 1-3 months, but are saved for eternity!
command.warn.notifiaction.warned.public: {mention}, as you disabled direct messages from everyone, I ping you here to let you know: **You have been warned!** Use the command `user` in a bot channel on the server to see further information on the warn! Warns usually expire after 1-3 months, but are saved for eternity!
